adjective.description: Of or relating to the former order Percomorphi or the series Percomorpha, both of which comprise most of the acanthopterygian fishes.

origin: Late 19th century; earliest use found in American Naturalist. From scientific Latin Percomorphi, former order name from Perca, genus name + -o- + -morphi. In later use from scientific Latin Percomorpha, series name.
